channel.title: Business Services on Business Directory
channel.description: Recent content in Business Services on Business Directory

item.title: KAS Chartered Accountant
item.description:
About Us

KAS Chartered Accountant offers comprehensive financial services including financial statements preparation, taxation filing, payroll management, and corporate secretarial and advisory services. Our expertise ensures compliance and strategic financial planning for businesses of all sizes.

Our Services

  • Financial Statements: Professional preparation of financial statements and reports
  • Taxation Filing: Comprehensive tax preparation and filing services
  • Payroll Management: Complete payroll processing and management solutions
  • Corporate Services: Secretarial and advisory services for businesses

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Kevon Sieusankar
  • Phone: 309-9994
  • Email: ksieusankar@gmail.com

item.title: Malayahs Consultancy Services
item.description:
About Us

Malayahs Consultancy Services specializes in HSEQ consultancy, business development, audits, and training. We provide tailored team building programs to enhance organizational performance and ensure compliance with industry standards.

Our Services

  • HSEQ Consultancy: Comprehensive health, safety, environment, and quality consulting
  • Business Development: Strategic guidance for business growth and improvement
  • Audits: Professional assessment of business processes and compliance
  • Training Programs: Specialized training for organizational development
  • Team Building: Customized programs to enhance team performance

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Ria Malayah
  • Phone: 346-2781
  • Email: rialisa@yahoo.com
